alert.note: Alert for Coastal Harris; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 5:59PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Galveston, northeastern Brazoria and southeastern Harris Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 558 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northeastern Pearland, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pasadena, eastern Pearland, northern Friendswood, Deer Park, South Houston, Galena Park, Greater Hobby Area, South Belt / Ellington, Clear Lake, Brookside Village, Golfcrest / Bellfort / Reveille, Edgebrook Area, Minnetex, Meadowbrook / Allendale, Ellington Field, Houston Ship Channel, South Acres / Crestmont Park, Hobby Airport, Park Place and South Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Harris; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris
